{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3486609,"name":"6894 Lead prog/driver","username":"Mochatitan","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/mochatitan/{size}/237112_2.png","created_at":"2025-01-18T16:10:38.638Z","cooked":"

we are trying to turn our old swerve code into new swerve code with the new rev library, but they just… removed the method to make the conversion easier. the javadocs on RelativeEncoder.setPosition() still advise you to set the position conversion factor with the method, but the method is gone. its just not there.

","post_number":1,"post_type":1,"posts_count":4,"updated_at":"2025-01-18T16:10:38.638Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":182,"reads":61,"readers_count":60,"score":922.2,"yours":false,"topic_id":482462,"topic_slug":"relativeencoder-setpositionconversionfactor-is-gone","display_username":"6894 Lead prog/driver","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":63063,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"6894 | Lead prog/Driver"},"post_url":"/t/relativeencoder-setpositionconversionfactor-is-gone/482462/1","custom_user_title":"6894 | Lead prog/Driver","reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null,"can_vote":false},{"id":3486614,"name":"Jezreel Sanchez","username":"Jez_sanchez","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/j/d2c977/{size}.png","created_at":"2025-01-18T16:21:28.629Z","cooked":"

They changed their library where it is similar to how CTRE speed controllers need to be configured. So for this you will need to make an object of SparkMaxConfig or SparkFlexConfig and then do the name of the object.encoder.setPositionConversion. Here is my teams code for how we had to configure our Relative and Absolute. We still have to push the changes we did to make our swerve works but to answer your Relative Encoder position conversion will be in the Module file but make sure to do SparkMaxConfig or SparkFlexConfig whichever speed controller you are getting this relative encoder from
